paragraphs.intro: Hello! My name is Antonio and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. My interest in web development started back in 2012 when I decided to try editing custom Tumblr themes ‚Äî turns out hacking together HTML & CSS taught me a lot about web development!
paragraphs.experience: Fast-forward to today, and I've had the privilege of working at an advertising agency, a start-up, a huge corporation, and a digital product studio. My main focus these days is building accessible, inclusive products and digital experiences at a variety of companies.
paragraphs.technologies: Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

jobs.title: Lead Software Engineer / Software Architect
responsibilities: Defined and implemented Domain-Driven Design and Hexagonal Architecture approach, replacing tightly coupled microservices with a clean, testable monorepo
Replaced legacy PHP/Symfony stack with modular React + Next.js frontend and Node.js + Express backend
Built the team from zero - hiring, mentoring, and developing junior engineers into senior contributors
Designed standalone API layer with business logic decoupled from infrastructure, tested via TDD
Delivered a fully dockerized, idempotent, and maintainable codebase

jobs.title: Senior Software Developer
responsibilities: Modernized a legacy Symfony application with no documentation, no Docker setup, and tightly coupled business logic
Introduced Domain-Driven Design structure to decouple business rules from framework
Dockerized entire application, set up CI/CD pipelines, and introduced TDD and Cypress-based testing
Worked closely with distributed teams across Europe in fully remote environment
Implemented architecture patterns inspired by Hexagonal Architecture

jobs.title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Worked on Symfony-based platform, implementing features and contributing to existing architecture
Focused on backend development and added unit tests for key API endpoints
Improved code reliability and maintainability
Collaborated directly with CTO in semi-onsite environment

jobs.title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Built new microservice to support marketing operations using PHP (Symfony), MongoDB, and Docker
Followed CQRS pattern with high test coverage and clear separation of concerns
Collaborated closely with Product Owner to deliver scalable, reliable features
Implemented new functionalities, wrote unit and integration tests improving delivery quality

jobs.title: Developer
responsibilities: Developed and maintained monolithic web application using PHP (Laravel), MySQL, HTML, CSS, and jQuery
Implemented business-focused features and iterated quickly to meet product needs
Gained valuable experience working with Docker, managing local environments and debugging complex flows
Developed PHP skills and learned to navigate legacy systems within startup context
